name: Nifty Lifty 2 ANDROID EDITION
description:
Any support much appreciated! ko-fi.com/rozeybozzy

Remake /Sequel of the early 80s hidden gem Nifty Lifty, by Janco on the BBC Micro  and converted by Kevin Bezant to the ZX Spectrum. Guest voice by@jenkin7NICK as Peter Peppa Pot. High scores, high action over 40 screens, and 3 difficulty levels. Graphics inspired by the Sinclair ZX Spectrum and featuring classical musical score.
